channel.title: Helmholtz Machine on Tom George
channel.description: Recent content in Helmholtz Machine on Tom George

item.title: A generative model of the hippocampal formation trained with theta driven local learning rules
item.description: In this paper we introduce a biologically plausible model of the hippocampal formation tantamount to a Helmholts machine trained with rapidly oscillating theta-driven sleep-wake cycle.
